title: Intelligent Tutoring System Design Utilizing Online Learning Resource Clustering

context.prior_knowledge: Basic data analysis concepts and experience using digital learning platforms
context.additional_context: A project-based process exploring efficient classification of online learning resources and the application of intelligent tutoring systems for corporate language learning administrators

learning_goals: Learners can describe procedures for identifying and removing outliers through density analysis of online learning resources
Learners can systematically classify language learning resources using a minimum spanning tree (MST)-based clustering algorithm in a project-based task
Learners can design user group modeling strategies based on clustering results and propose their application to intelligent tutoring systems

resources: Python Data Analysis Library (with In-house Installation Support)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
